website_summaries.verdict: A reliable way to keep dry. Easy to carry with you.
pros: Adhesive strips to help them stay in place – even overnight
cons: These pads can be bulky and seen through clothes

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for postpartum thinking I wouldn’t need them until I got home from the hospital. Wrong! Used them from day one! Pack in your hospital bag! I switched to washable ones later when we got home but used these if my washable ones were all dirty and kept a pair on my purse in case of accidents. Didn’t irritate at all, and I’m a first time breastfeeding mom.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: Great for leaky b**bs....but....
customer_reviews.text: If you hear that these can be used for makeshift N95 masks, they won't work. Can't breathe through them. Probably good for what they were designed for. Giving them to a Mormon friend of my wife who is pregnant quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Gargurevich

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable and easy to use. I've been able to get them to last a full 24 hours before, but it honestly just depends on how much milk bursts out of you. However, for daily use that doesn't involve many "milk explosions", they're fantastic! They stay in the bra very well and remain comfy up until you switch them out. I do have to say that they are rather expensive, which made me go with an alternative reusable brand, but if you just need something disposable for a short time, these are your best choice over the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Work well enough
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a huge fan of disposable nursing pads. They’re not nearly as comfortable as reusable, but they do look a lot better under a bra while out and about. These absorb a small amount, but for their size, they absorb pretty well. A little crinkly, which is annoying, a little itchy, but overall ok. I like that they are individually wrapped so it’s easy to throw some in the diaper bag and not worry about them getting all gross. Plus, when you open a new one you have a nice little package to put the old one in.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any nursing mama!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this brand. I have been using them with all three of my kids. I am happy that I am able to purchase them on Amazon. I have not had an issue with leaking outside of my bra or a shirt when I wear these. I mostly need to wear them at night. But when I wear them in the day, you can not even tell I have them on. I like that they stick on to the inside of any bra or shirt and you don’t have to worry about them falling out or moving around. they are thin and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Bullinger

customer_reviews.title: Absorb well
customer_reviews.text: I first tried these from the starter pack and really liked them. They absorb really well and I could go about half a day with them on. They stick on well and easily come off without leaving stickiness on my clothes. The only things I didn't like were that they came individually wrapped. I would at least like for a pair to be wrapped together, but it's extremely wasteful to me. I also didn't think they were that soft. They would sometimes feel scratchy or make me itchy even if they weren't wet.
customer_reviews.author: ECasper16

customer_reviews.title: Discrete, good size and toss it out at the end of the day
customer_reviews.text: These disposable pads are great. I wear them for a day and toss them out when I’m done! No need to wait for laundry day, and I know I have a fresh sanitary item each time. I worry about what sorts of bacteria is growing on something that’s waiting in the hamper to be washed on Landry day. This is important with a newborn you don’t want to expose to germs/bacteria at such a young age. These are discrete, a nice size, and I appreciate the adhesive backing to stick to my nursing bra. It doesn’t fall/fly off when I let my bra down for feedings! Will be buying more ASAP, as I am almost out.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Gallaga

customer_reviews.title: Confusing title
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for "disposable" pads and found these....I didn't want reusable ones for a few reasons, the most important I am going to have too much to wash as it is and disposable is so much easier. They arrived and even though the Amazon title says "disposable" the box says reusable - and mentions how study they are wash after wash. Haven't used them yet, but unsure who is misleading - Amazon or Lansinoh...confusing!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: They do the job
customer_reviews.text: These absorb a ton! I was so impressed. I never had any leaks with these. They are small, compact, and easy to carry in your purse or diaper bag. They also don't look bulky under your shirt. They do tend to move a bit in the bra, but a quick adjust is all that's needed, its not too annoying.
customer_reviews.author: rsmithski

customer_reviews.title: Used for a year and recommend to any breastfeeding/pumping mom
customer_reviews.text: For a mom who was trying to breastfeed, pump and work full-time, these were a must this past year to keep from having embarrassing leaks. They are really absorbent and I never had issues with leaking, even during the night. They weren't the stickiest in the world, but just as good as other brands I tried out.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh.C

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes moves out of place
customer_reviews.text: I swore by Philips Avent brand because they were inexpensive and got the job done. But since they have since discontinued, I've found the Lansinoh brand and I've been satisfied. These have absorbed a significant amount of letdown and engorgement milk. They will leak if they are extremely full and depending on the type of bra used, they may come out of place from time to time. Especially if you sleep on your back.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Best disposable pads
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried lots of brands and like these the best. They are soft, stay in place, and absorb a lot. I just wish they were not each individually wrapped because they make a lot of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jen H

customer_reviews.title: They're super soft and stay put!
customer_reviews.text: These pads have improved since I nursed my last baby 12 years ago! My surgeons office suggested that I buy nursing pads to protect my clothing from seeping from my incisions after a breast reduction. They work great and are super soft! For multiple days I've had the glue from my incisions start to loosen and fall off and it never gets stuck to the pads! I love that they are individually wrapped so I can throw a few in my bag to change throughout the day. Since wach pad has two areas of adhesive they stay put all day.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job great product
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable, holds leakage very well, fits well in your bra, I brought them for a baby shower gift for my nice since she is breastfeeding. I used this product as well when I was breastfeeding and they worked just fine for me so I decided to buy these for my nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Good shape and great absorption
customer_reviews.text: As far as disposable breast pads go, these are my go-to. They absorb the most, stay in place and are ROUND! Why is round so hard to come by? These are best for those earlier weeks/months where production is on the rise and leaks are common. They absorb a lot more than the reusable cotton and since you are wearing other pads elsewhere, may as well tuck them into your bra as well
customer_reviews.author: collin mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This work so well and I never leak through my bras when wearing these pads. I don’t like that they have a sticky back as my boobs move in my bra and I need to readjust once in awhile. I just set them in my bra but the paper on the sticky tends to come of so I have to change them more frequently then I’d like.
customer_reviews.author: MommaGab

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These nursing pads are great! They are super absorbent—they wick the moisture away so well that the only way i can tell if I’ve leaked is that the pad seems a bit heavier when I take it out. The only con to this product is that they don’t stick to your bra very well. However that’s not really a big deal since they stay in place pretty well anyway.
customer_reviews.author: N H

customer_reviews.title: These are Great
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time mom and these do really good job of keeping me dry. For around the house I use reusable pads, but if I am out in public these are my go to's. The last thing I want is a sudden let down the drenches my shirt while at the store. I speak from experience, Its embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Twig

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Used these same ones with all 3 of the kids over the last 10 years! Only ones I like! Really keep you dry, and absorb A LOT! I’m a constant leaker throughout the entire time I’m nursing too. I’m about a 34D and they fit great and very sleek!
customer_reviews.author: Kylee S.

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing pads
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Absorbs a lot. Comfortable and has cushion. I used it when I was pregnant 2 years ago and really liked it. I bought a box as part of a baby shower gift for my girlfriend. Hope she likes it as much as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: A Nursing MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Best nursing pads I've found!! I tried the "Wash and reuse" pads but they shrunk and became malformed after only one wash - these disposable pads are the very best solution!! Pads can be worn for a few days and are highly absorbent (which is great for night time leakage or days my little one doesn't feel like eating regularly). They fit easily in all of my bras, both nursing and normal. They also have 2 sticky sections so I can stick them directly to my clothing if I'm not wearing a bra. Overall a wonderful product!!
customer_reviews.author: Cj Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I got what I wanted. Granted, with tandem nursing, I'm having less leakage than last time but I'm more than satisfied with how well these absorb. As for how they feel, I don't even notice that they're in there, which is a win.
customer_reviews.author: Peripolou

customer_reviews.title: Product box damaged
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a bubble mailer. It was not enough protection for the product as the product box is severely smushed and dented. This was supposed to be part of a baby shower gift. Definitely does not look presentable to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Way larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review for A-B cup women. I'm a pretty petite person, and I have never purchased nursing pads before. I Was a bit surprised at how large they are. They definitely won't fit in the cup of a A-B cup bra.
customer_reviews.author: LeChels

customer_reviews.title: Great for breastfeeding moms!
customer_reviews.text: As a breastfeeding mom these have been absolutely great, specially for when we go out in public to avoid the lovely wet shirts that come with the leaking fun! I had one time I forgot to bring a pump and we were out for a few hours and I leaked through the pads but we had been out for almost 6 hours. So it holds a lot of weight!
customer_reviews.author: denedra

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Being a first time mom made me nervous about possibly leaking but this product is very effective in helping me stay dry and it's also comfortable. I appreciate how it stays right where I place it. I've tried other products but this one is by far useful in getting the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought these right away before I leaked through so many bras and shirts. The only issues is that the stickers suck so you have to keep shoving them back in your bra and adjusting them which doors cause some leakage. Otherwise very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Liliya Vorobey

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I tried 2 other brands and they do not compare to Lansinoh. Nursing pads are not the most comfortable thing to have to wear but these are pretty good and not too noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Steffanie

customer_reviews.title: Great, but painful if stuck to skin
customer_reviews.text: These were great, but I gave it a 4 with adhesion due to the fact that they sometimes get stuck to your breast while you’re feeding your baby and that is VERY painful to remove. I would have preferred to have purchased non-adhesive ones, but I have not been able to find them anywhere. On a positive note, they stay in place very well! And, they are very absorbent, too.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Used these the entire time I breast fed
customer_reviews.text: I over lactated 90% of the time and these are the only ones I used. I tried washables but they just soaked through. I never soaked through these and they always stayed in place.
customer_reviews.author: ABBYANNE

customer_reviews.title: Great product , awful shipping
customer_reviews.text: This review is not for the product itself, as I have used these before and they work great... this review is for the shipment. I had to look back at my order today when these were delivered as I completely forgot that they were even part of my order. This order was placed on April 6th. I just received them today, May 8th in a used, horribly taped up package and with no invoice or anything. Opened the package and said to myself “oh yeah I forgot about these”. And the box was dented in and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, these are the only ones I’ve used and liked for the past 6 weeks. I’ve tried the Medela ones as well and they are scratchy and hurt your nipples but these are soft and very absorbent. Second time buying!
customer_reviews.author: Madison Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a rash, dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Gave me a rash, had me convinced I had thrush. Made my nipples red and itchy but as soon as I stopped using them it cleared up. Do yourself a favor and just buy some reusable bamboo ones instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Leann

customer_reviews.title: A little bunchy/bulky, but best leak protection!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best disposable nursing pads I have tried. Now I will say, I did not nurse for a long time, but I have used these with all three of my children. I did experience a little bit of bunching, and they would be a bit lumpy under camis and such, but they did the job; I never had to worry about breastmilk leaking through my shirt ever.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Trandum

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste ur money
customer_reviews.text: They are absorbent but they move around and fold up and become super uncomfortable especially when you're nursing constantly. Very inconvenient
customer_reviews.author: Beretta

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome and do exactly what they are meant for!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and do exactly what they are meant for! My only gripe is that the adhesion is not the best, especially when the pads are full.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Ebel

customer_reviews.title: Better than madela nursing pads
customer_reviews.text: Liked these better than madela nursing pads for their absorbancy and adhesive. The glue in madela comes out and creates a total mess on the bra.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Piercing Protection
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the healing process of piercings to keep clean and love them! Discrete, love that they stick the the bra, and easy to carry on the go. I hope they’re as great for all the mama’s using them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I always go back to these. Have tried every kind under the sun, and these are the best. Not perfect, no breast pad is- but these are quality.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: these nursing pads are super absorbent,and very comfortable (soft). When I don’t wear them I leal right through so embarrassing so I keep stacks at home and make sure to never run out.
customer_reviews.author: SabMar

customer_reviews.title: they're the perfect size, light
customer_reviews.text: I've tried these, as well as an entirely organic brand (because I prefer things that way). These just far surpass the competition. I've never had a leak, they're the perfect size, light, slim and super soft. Plus the sticky bits on the back keep them in place but aren't so overly sticky that they leave a gross sticky patch on my clothes. They come individually wrapped so that I can stuff a couple in the diaper bag, unlike their organic competitors. These are just too good to go with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: The Z's

customer_reviews.title: These disposable pads don't stick very well to my bra ...
customer_reviews.text: These disposable pads don't stick very well to my bra, but they stick to my breasts! Ended up buying some washable and reusable pads instead!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Super soft, stay in place, never leak
customer_reviews.text: Lansinoh is the best brand from all nursing pads I used in the years I've been breastfeeding. Super soft, stay in place, never leak.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: These are the breast pads I've purchased with all of my kids. I have leaked through them before, but that was more my fault than the pads. They work. I mean, not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Parker

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I have never commented before. Maybe I was bored at home during the epidemic. Recently, I have fallen in love with comments
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, but needs stronger adhesive
customer_reviews.text: These collected a lot of milk. I just didnt think the adhesive was strong enough. The pads would always fall off of my bra when I took it on and off. I went through a lot of them because I would drop so many on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are really absorbent and can be used for hours. The only thing I didn’t like was they don’t stick in place well enough. But they are worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Carr

customer_reviews.title: A must have for breastfeeding moms :)
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Other brands I find myself having to change them out very often during the day. These I can use one all day and no leaks! Stays in place and doesnt stick to your skin when leaks dry. Also, packaging is very quiet and discreet for those who want privacy in public bathrooms. :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lopez

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I've also tried the first years, they had lanolin already in them, which was awesome, but had a super scratchy outer rim. Playtex are super soft and absorbent but are quite thick, great for overnight. These are wonderful! I ordered this small pack because I read reviews calling them "scratchy". These were not at all! Super thin too! The box looks slightly different than the big packs that come 4 boxes in an order so Im wondering if these are newer or different at all. Im ordering the big pack next, so we'll see. I have no complaints for this specific individual box sold here though.
customer_reviews.author: ForPJ

customer_reviews.title: Loved
customer_reviews.text: These pads were so amazing they aren’t as sticky as I expected them to be but they are so absorbent and you couldn’t even notice I had them on!!
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great and lasts a while! Very absorbent which is exactly what you need when you are breastfeeding
customer_reviews.author: Michele Clemo

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing pads
customer_reviews.text: I have breastfed all five of my kids and have tried several different breastfeeding pads through the years. These pads are by far the best on the market. They will always be my go to!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These are great, I've gone through 2 packs already. Only issue is they don't always stay in place super well and sometimes ball up in my bra, I feel like they need to be replaced every time I nurse instead of just daily.
customer_reviews.author: Justthe2ofus

customer_reviews.title: Work well, could be stickier.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for leakage and to have as something soft between your sore nipples and bra. I only wish the sticky part on the back was stickier. They don’t stay stuck to a bra or shirt when you fold or move it down to feed or pump. But small price to pay for a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Feels dry
customer_reviews.text: Excellent absorbency. Seems like it kind of gels. Feels dry to the touch. Stays in place. Not super duper soft but comfortable. I even tried a more expensive bamboo brand and didn’t like it. It left cotton on my boobs and didn’t feel dry after leaking like these did.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle kekauoha

customer_reviews.title: and I loved it. When I had my second baby
customer_reviews.text: When I had my first baby, I had a lot of leakage, so i purchased it in the store, and I loved it. When I had my second baby, I decided to purchase it from amazon, because it was a lot cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Honest review

customer_reviews.title: Better than others
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried these along with Medela and Walmart brand. I prefer these because they contour to your breast better and are less noticeable under clothes
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: by far my fav breast pads love how easy and quick they absorb milk i have these on reorder
customer_reviews.author: Macary

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive could’ve been a little better but they worked great
customer_reviews.author: Darlene N

customer_reviews.title: Good quality an value
customer_reviews.text: Grandaughter loved these , so helpful after home from hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara scott

customer_reviews.title: Good for new mom
customer_reviews.text: Absorption is very good, very thin, very suitable for lactating mothers. The only drawback is that it's not sticky at all.
customer_reviews.author: Xenia

customer_reviews.title: Loved these for sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! Very absorbant and sticky! Doesn’t even look like you are wearing anything.
customer_reviews.author: ekilby

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price . helps me with my milk leaks
customer_reviews.author: arlett kitty

customer_reviews.title: These are great pads but kind of a pain to open each one every time.
customer_reviews.text: These are super absorbant, comfortable for the most part. The only thing I don't like is that each one is individualy wrapped in plastic which, one, is a huge waste of plastic, and two, is really annoying when you've just finished nursing or pumping! I would just like to pull them out of a box and stick them on. Instead I'm sitting there topless opening little baggies and trying to open the pads up (they're slightly sealed on the edges).
customer_reviews.author: Chanch

customer_reviews.title: Great place to buy these if you feel awkward in the store
customer_reviews.text: Love these for breastfeeding they work so great. No more milk stained shirts. Idk why but I always feel weird purchasing these in the store so I just buy them on here and don’t even have to leave my house
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbant!
customer_reviews.text: These are great breast pads - very absorbant. I tried reusable pads, but they got very wet and soaked through after only a couple hours. I can use these all day and not get soaked by them.
customer_reviews.author: KelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not eco friendly
customer_reviews.text: Why did I give bad review when i gave 5 stars for each criteria? Simply because it is ridiculous to have each pad individually packed!!!! So much plastic waisted!!! Terrible for environment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend these to any pregnant woman
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend these to any pregnant woman. Toward the end of your pregnancy, you may start leaking, and this will save some bras and shirts (+ your dignity in public!). I used them a lot more frequently once the baby was here.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to sore nipples
customer_reviews.text: These do the job of keeping my shirt dry, but they dont lay smoothly and can be seen through a thin bra, and in the first few days of breastfeeding when my nipples were sore and damaged, the pads stuck to my nipple and hurt when removing! No problem if I put nipple cream on first though
customer_reviews.author: Acranston

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pads!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my wife to use; it absorbed very nicely and doesn’t dripped, and she felt comfortable. I’d already brought a second badge for her and she said will continue to buy more of this brand once she runs out again.
customer_reviews.author: Simon jyj

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent. Cheap. Soft.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many other breast pads and these are by far my favorite. I have yet to soak through the absorbency of these. Easy to take out of the packaging and pretty cheap too. I like they they are very soft and don’t feel rough when I’m wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Absorbency
customer_reviews.text: I love this much better then the medella one. It absorbs waaaaay more i can have it on all day and night and still feel comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Best nursing pads on market. Only ones that are soft. Best absorbency without being too large.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and soft. Pretty thick though but it’s o for me
customer_reviews.author: Kateryna

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you dry
customer_reviews.text: These disposable pads are awesome! I have yet to leak in one. These pads holds up well and keeps you dry all day. It doesn't bother my nipples at all. The adhesive kind of sucks but it will stay put in your bra or tank top. Overall I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and work well
customer_reviews.text: I surprised my cousin with these breast pads because she just had her first child. She love them and the price is reasonable. She wear them with no bras sometimes and she don’t have any issues
customer_reviews.author: Lashawn coates

customer_reviews.title: Best nursing bra!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product. They fit very well and most importantly are easy to unhook and rehook when nursing. I ordered another bra that seemed similar until I had to rehook it. It was a nightmare getting it hooked and I needed both hands.this bra is easy to use while still being very supportive. I sleep in it almost every night and an extremely pleased
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. It absorbs well and feels comfortable. I’m on my 4th purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: May Liu

customer_reviews.title: they like enlarge or puff up and feel weird when I ...
customer_reviews.text: they are okay. when they get wet, they like enlarge or puff up and feel weird when I take them out of my bra. I am gonna use reusable ones next time
customer_reviews.author: AllisonL

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing pads
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Medela girl but Lansinoh has the best nursing pads. They absorb and maintain well in bra. The adhesive is also a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Yesenia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Decent middle-of-the-road coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Best combo of lightweight vs. absorption I found. Not as hot and bulky in the summer. Still a little lumpy when applied but less so than some other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Oppentot

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like these and have used them for years! ! I think these are great and the price is not bad at all!
customer_reviews.author: Firealj

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It okay for the time being no longer the 30 min a pad
customer_reviews.author: Amiee .M

customer_reviews.title: It’s very annoying to try to reposition the pad every time and ...
customer_reviews.text: The sticker to attach to bra are not that sticky. It’s very annoying to try to reposition the pad every time and if it fold by accident then the pads gets ruined because then it sticks to itself in half.
customer_reviews.author: jester tolentino

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: These work really well for me. Used them last pregnancy and now I'm going to use them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for nursing mom
customer_reviews.text: If you are feeding your baby, you should have this pad for preventing milk wet your bra.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I have very leaky breasts due to frequent breast feeding. These do not absorb the milk. It goes straight through the flimsy pad, onto my nursing bra, then right through my shirt. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, absorbs well
customer_reviews.text: These fit very well and are pretty thin. I've been wearing thin tshirts for the summer and usually the pads don't show through. I've never had a problem with them leaking through at all. They stay put just fine without the adhesive. My only complaint is that they get dislodged when you actually nurse, and the adhesive doesn't seem strong enough to keep them in place. So you just have to reposition them after you're done nursing.
customer_reviews.author: Bayley

customer_reviews.title: The best nursing pads!
customer_reviews.text: Have tried other disposables & washables. These are hands down the best. Comfortable to wear. Sticky keeps them held to your bra so they don't move around. Most important, they keep you dry and absorb alot !
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: By far the most comfortable and very absorbent. I have tried other brands an I like these the best
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great product over all.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the box came damaged with in another box?!?! This clearly was damaged through a third party or repackaging.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Itchy
customer_reviews.text: I did not care for these. They made my nipple itchy. They also don’t stay in place very well.
customer_reviews.author: Yelnam

customer_reviews.title: Dryness
customer_reviews.text: It was nice journey to breasfreed my little one . When I was using this nursing pads I was feeling comfortable and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Gerda

customer_reviews.title: Hands down - best disposable nursing pad!
customer_reviews.text: Very absorbent - hands down the best nursing pad. Recommend over reusable pads and other disposable pads, especially if you leak a lot. The excess milk turns into a gel-like form which eliminates leakage on your clothes and odor. Found other disposable pads and reusable pads leave a sour milk odor. Recommend buying in bulk for cheaper per unit cost.
customer_reviews.author: jaspac

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: IF you can, get the medela. This is just really bulky and makes you feel a cup size bigger then your already enlarged breasts. Gets all curled up and is just uncomftable. Never leaked though
customer_reviews.author: Sam Deniz

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They’re absorbent and I haven’t had any leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: Delivery frustration
customer_reviews.text: Product was great but was shoved into my mailbox where it clearly did not fit and totally smushed up the box. This is the second time my amazon order has been put into the mailbox that it hurt the product. Very unprofessional.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Gives rash, breast itchy all day long
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 times, Both times gave me an awful rash, kept walking around scratching my breast for the whole day (not something you wanna do in public) :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna Maria

customer_reviews.title: Best ones I've used
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. My favorite nursing pads. I have never had any leaks. They stay where put, unlike other ones.
customer_reviews.author: K.Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These saved my life right after having my newborn! Super easy to use and super helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Barney

product_meta.title: Lansinoh Stay Dry Disposable Nursing Pads for Breastfeeding, 36 count
product_meta.description:
Lansinoh Nursing Pads are designed for maximum comfort and leak proof coverage. Lansinoh Stay Dry breast pads have a quilted, honeycomb lining and a unique breathable waterproof layer for leakproof protection.

Our disposable nursing pads are individually wrapped and have two adhesive strips to keep the pad in place in your breastfeeding bras. Our nipple pads also have a contoured shape, are discreet under clothing, and are comfortable to wear even when wet.

Ideal for a breastfeeding mom with medium flow, we recommend changing the nursing pad often to maintain healthy skin, if possible after every feeding. Easy to carry on hand in a diaper bag, pump bag or purse.

Lansinoh offers the #1 selling breastfeeding pads in the US. All of the ingredients in our pads are non-toxic and latex free. 

Founded by a breastfeeding mom, Lansinoh has been committed to helping moms succeed in breastfeeding for over 30 years. Famous for our award-winning cornerstone product, HPA Lanolin, Lansinoh is a leader in breastfeeding pumps, breast pads disposable, and other products and accessories.
feature_bullets: ABSORBENT FOR LEAK-PROOF CONFIDENCE: The #1 selling disposable nursing pads in the US. Lansinoh Stay Dry Disposable Nursing Pads feature one-way moisture technology and a waterproof lining for leak-proof confidence.

SUPER SOFT COMFORT: Lansinoh Stay Dry Disposable Nursing Pads feature a quilted honeycomb layer for a dry and comfortable feeling. We recommend changing the pad often to maintain healthy skin, if possible after every feeding.

DISCREET & CONVENIENT: These nursing pads feature a contoured shape that ensures a comfortable & discreet fit even when wet. Each pad is individually wrapped for convenience on the go. Two adhesive strips keep the pad in place.

NURSING PADS FOR NURSING MOMS: It’s normal for moms to leak breastmilk. Some moms leak only in the beginning and some moms continue throughout breastfeeding. Until you know, you can count on Lansinoh Nursing Pads to keep you dry and confident.

MOM FOUNDED & PARENT LED: Founded by a breastfeeding mom, Lansinoh has supported moms for 35 years with award winning breast pumps, nipple creams, nursing pads, and breast milk storage bags, helping families create bonds that last a lifetime.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
